title: Parent-Teacher Conference Scheduled
content: We are pleased to announce that parent-teacher conferences will be held from November 25-27, 2023. Please schedule your appointments through the school portal or contact the main office. This is an excellent opportunity to discuss your child's academic progress and any concerns you may have.

title: Science Fair Registration Open
content: The annual Science Fair is approaching! Registration is now open for all students in grades 6-12. Projects are due by January 15, 2024, and the fair will be held on January 20, 2024. This year's theme is 'Innovations for a Sustainable Future'. Prizes will be awarded in multiple categories.

title: Winter Break Schedule
content: Winter break will begin on December 22, 2023, and classes will resume on January 8, 2024. The school office will be closed from December 25 - January 1. Emergency contact information will be available on the school website. We wish everyone a safe and happy holiday season!

title: Grade 11 Field Trip to Science Museum
content: Grade 11 students will be visiting the State Science Museum on November 30, 2023. Permission slips must be submitted by November 25. The bus will depart at 8:00 AM and return by 3:00 PM. Please pack a lunch or bring money for the museum cafeteria. This trip relates to our current physics curriculum.

title: New Library Hours
content: Starting November 20, 2023, the school library will extend its hours. New schedule: Monday-Thursday 7:30 AM - 6:00 PM, Friday 7:30 AM - 4:00 PM. Students can now access additional study time and research resources. Computer lab reservations are available through the library staff.

title: Staff Professional Development Day
content: November 24, 2023, will be a professional development day for all faculty and staff. Classes will be cancelled for this day. Teachers will be attending workshops on educational technology and curriculum development. Regular classes will resume on Monday, November 27.
